title: Spicy chilli con carne
ingredients: ['1 onion', '1 green pepper', '2 red and 1 green chilli', '4 mushrooms', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon dried coriander', '1 teaspoon cumin', '3 teaspoons mild chilli powder', '1/2 teaspoon dried ginger', '250g lean minced beef', '1 1/2 tins chopped tomatoes', '200ml beef stock made from cube', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
